summary: selector to screw the chairnut1 to the chairseatbolt1 with the left_hand holding the defaultgripper
name: selector: screw(chairnut1, chairseatbolt1, left_hand, defaultgripper)

children.summary: check the target that the chairnut1 is screwed to the chairseatbolt1
children.name: target: is_screwed_to(chairnut1, chairseatbolt1)

children.summary: sequence to screw the chairnut1 to the chairseatbolt1 with the left_hand holding the defaultgripper
children.name: sequence: screw(chairnut1, chairseatbolt1, left_hand, defaultgripper)

children.summary: check the precondition that the left_hand is holding the defaultgripper
children.name: precondition: hold(left_hand, defaultgripper)

children.summary: selector to pick_up the defaultgripper with the left_hand
children.name: selector: pick_up(left_hand, defaultgripper)

children.summary: check the target that the defaultgripper is picked up by the left_hand
children.name: target: hold(defaultgripper, left_hand)

children.summary: sequence to pick_up the defaultgripper with the left_hand
children.name: sequence: pick_up(left_hand, defaultgripper)

children.summary: check the precondition that the defaultgripper is empty
children.name: precondition: is_empty(defaultgripper)

children.summary: the action to pick_up the defaultgripper with the left_hand
children.name: action: pick_up(left_hand, defaultgripper)

children.summary: the action to screw the chairnut1 to the chairseatbolt1 with the left_hand holding the defaultgripper
children.name: action: screw(chairnut1, chairseatbolt1, left_hand, defaultgripper)
